data.title: Currency HUF Hungary [Hungarian forint]
data.text:
Other currency selection:

Currency

Currency details HUF Hungary [Hungarian forint]

Label of currency HUF is Hungarian forint.

Currency code HUF is associated to Hungary, flag is used on this site for it.

Amounts in this currency have up to 2 decimals.

It is mainly associated to country or zone Hungary.

Currency code HUF is a 3 letter normalized code according to standard ISO-4217, the 2 first letters are the code of the issuing country, third letter is the initial of the currency.

We recorded price on this currency since 1968-01-01

Current annual inflation rate for currency HUF is 4.147 %.

List of countries that are using or were using currency HUF :
